text:
Reporter Jonathan Swan tells @AriMelber "with all likelihood" President Trump will no longer hold daily White House coronavirus briefings.

"A source told me today that it finally seems to have dawned on the president that these may not be helpful after the disinfectant episode." https://t.co/1dKOgobFua
